returns.config: Unified function to retrieved `facetInterfaces()` AND `facetCuts()` in one call.

returns.facetCuts_: The IDiamond.FacetCut array to configuring a proxy with this package.

returns.funcs: The function selectors implemented by the facet.

facetMetadata().details: Exposed to allow for single call retrieval of all facet metadata.

returns.functions: The function selectors implemented by the facet.
returns.interfaces: The interface IDs implemented by the facet.
returns.name: The name of the facet.

processArgs(bytes).details: Provides a preprocessing hook for packages to normalize and/or decorate user provided arguments.User provided arguments may be returned unaltered if no processing is required.This returns the salt distinct from the arguments to allow for simpler salt calculations.

params.pkgArgs: The ABI encoded arguments the user is providing to the package. return initArgs The arguments to be used to initialize the chain state for a new DomainMemberProxy instance.

facetFuncs().notice: Declares the function selectors implemented by the exposing facet for use in a composing proxy.

facetMetadata().notice: Declares comprehensive metadata about the exposing facet.

facetName().notice: Declares a canonical nonunique name for the exposing facet.

processArgs(bytes).notice: The returned initArgs will be used by a DomainController to calculate the CREATE2 salt to be used when instantiating a DomainMemberProxy.
